00046 static bool global_timeout_spawned_ = false;
00047 
00048 #include "uvm_component_spec.cpp"
00049 
00050 // constructor of uvm_component spawns run() member method as a thread process
00051 
00052 uvm_component::uvm_component(sc_module_name nm) : sc_module(nm) { 
00053 
00054   uvm_common_schedule* pcommon_schedule = get_uvm_common_schedule();
00055   pcommon_schedule->register_callback(this);
00056 
00057   // TODO: should all component default to be part of UVM schedule?
00058   uvm_common_schedule* puvm_schedule = get_uvm_schedule();
00059   puvm_schedule->register_callback(this);
00060 
00061   if (!global_timeout_spawned_) {
00062     // spawn thread that will wait for m_global_timeout to expire
00063     sc_spawn_options o;
00064 
00065     MARK_THREAD_INVISIBLE(o);
00066     sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_manager::wait_for_global_timeout, get_uvm_manager()),
00067              "uvm_wait_for_global_timeout",
00068              &o
00069     );
00070     global_timeout_spawned_ = true;
00071   }
00072 }
00073 
00074 uvm_component::~uvm_component() { }
00075 
00076 bool uvm_component::has_child(const char* leaf_name) {
00077   string full_name = prepend_name(string(leaf_name));
00078   if (sc_find_object(full_name.c_str())) 
00079     return true;
00080   return false; 
00081 }

00116 bool uvm_component::get_config_object(

00118   uvm_object*& val,
00119   bool clone
00120 ) {
00121   val = NULL; // must initialize it because the template can not assign 0
00122   return uvm_config_db<uvm_object *>::get(this, "", field, val);
00123 }

00202 void uvm_component::run_phase(uvm_phase* phase) { 
00203   phase->barrier.raise_barrier();
00204   run();
00205   phase->barrier.drop_barrier();
00206 }

00290 string uvm_component::prepend_name(string s) {
00291   string n = name();
00292   if (s != "") {
00293     n += string(".");
00294     n += s;
00295   }
00296   return n;
00297 }

00299 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00300 // Function: get_num_children
00301 //  Returns the number of child components this components has.
00302 //
00303 // Returns:
00304 //  int - number of children the components has.
00305 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00306 int uvm_component::get_num_children() {
00307   std::vector<uvm_component*> child_vec;
00308   child_vec = get_children();
00309 
00310   return child_vec.size();
00311 }
00312 
00313 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00314 // Function: get_children
00315 //  Returns vector of pointers to children
00316 //
00317 // Returns:
00318 //  vec - vector of pointers to children
00319 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00320 std::vector<uvm_component*> uvm_component::get_children() {
00321   std::vector<sc_object*> child_vec;
00322   std::vector<uvm_component*> child_comp_vec;
00323   uvm_component* comp = NULL;
00324   child_vec = get_child_objects();
00325 
00326 
00327   for (int i = 0; i < child_vec.size(); i++)
00328   {
00329     comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(child_vec[i]);
00330     if (comp != NULL)
00331       child_comp_vec.push_back(comp);
00332   }
00333 
00334   return child_comp_vec;
00335 }
00336 
00337 
00338 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00339 // Function: get_parent
00340 //  Returns a pointer to the parent
00341 //
00342 // Returns:
00343 //  int - number of children the components has.
00344 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00345 uvm_component* uvm_component::get_parent() {
00346   uvm_component*      uvm_comp;
00347   sc_core::sc_object* sc_obj = sc_core::sc_module::get_parent();
00348   
00349   uvm_comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(sc_obj);
00350 
00351   return uvm_comp;
00352 }
